context.expanded: Early adopters of autonomous vehicles comprise a diverse group...

axes.name: Technology Literacy
axes.description: Ability to understand and use new technology

personas.name: Sarah Chen
personas.description: Sarah is a 32-year-old software engineer who works at a tech startup in San Francisco. She is always eager to try new technologies and often serves as the go-to person for tech advice among her friends and family.
behaviorPatterns: Researches new technologies extensively before purchasing
Willing to tolerate early bugs in exchange for being first
Shares experiences on social media and tech forums

personas.name: Robert Williams
personas.description: Robert is a 58-year-old retired teacher who is cautious about new technology but open to it if it solves a real problem. He's interested in autonomous vehicles primarily for safety and convenience as he ages.
behaviorPatterns: Asks family members for technology recommendations
Prefers thorough testing and proven reliability
Values simplicity and ease of use over features
